articles.author: Mitchell McCluskey, Nouran Salahieh
articles.title: 'None of us deserved it': Americans who survived kidnapping in Mexico share details of their captivity - CNN
articles.description: More than a month after four Americans were attacked and kidnapped by a drug cartel in Mexico, the two survivors say they're still recovering from the trauma of the terrifying ordeal and the killings of their friends.
articles.content: More than a month after four Americans were attacked and kidnapped by a drug cartel in Mexico, the two survivors say theyre still recovering from the trauma of the terrifying ordeal and the killings … [+5310 chars]
